creator: siva.naga@cibc.com
text:
While recodring script I am getting an error dialog box that has folloing 
message

"system.xml.xmlexception: there is no Unicode byte order mark. Cannot switch to 
unicode"

Created attachment 20982
This the error dialog box I have got while recording 

Please tell me how can I over come this problem, I am brand new user of Jmeter,
so please guide me to resolve this issue

Thanks
Siva
creator: siva.naga@cibc.com
sebb@apache.org
text:
The error message is produced by Internet Explorer, which is presumably 
objecting to some of the content returned by the proxy.

I presume it only happens with some pages that you visit. The problem URL 
should be at or near the end of the recorded samples.

Without some more information it is impossible to diagnose the problem further.

Are you testing against a publicly accessible server?
Not possible to proceed without further information
creator: sebb@apache.org
